Text:
Dawkins said, "If you're ever invited to debate religion with Hitchens...dont"
I'm glad Blair never heard that quote because its a pleasure to see him getting torn apart by the master. And to think this moron ran the country....

The quality is not very good and the audio is out of sync.

AS far as the debate is concerned, I thought it pretty even and that Blair made a good case.  I am an atheist though.
